results.name: Number of multiplications when calculating A084110(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Divisor Product.
program: f c x (d:ds) = if r == 0 then f c x' ds else f (c + 1) (x * d) ds
